name: America's Response v1.5
description:
There is gun violence. Games are blamed. Solutions are given that seem ludicrous. To encompass all these ideas I have created AR15; a simulation of events that could occur if teachers are armed to deal with active shooters.

Controls: WASD or Arrow keys to move. Numpad to discharge your weapon. R to reload. X to draw your weapon. Z to prime your weapon for discharge.
